alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena; Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Helena, northern Livingston, central Tangipahoa and west central Washington Parishes through 315 PM CDT... At 249 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wilmer, or 9 miles northeast of Amite, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Amite, Amite City, Kentwood, Independence, Roseland, Montpelier, Natalbany, Wilmer, Tangipahoa and Tickfaw. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 43 and 44. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 35 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena; Washington
